00083 
00084 #define DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT 10
00085 
00086 /* See http://nagiosplug.sourceforge.net/developer-guidelines.html */
00087 /* The plugin was able to check the service and it appeared to be
00088    functioning properly.  */
00089 #define NAGIOS_OK 0
00090 
00091 /* The plugin was able to check the service, but it appeared to be
00092    above some "warning" threshold or did not appear to be working
00093    properly.  */
00094 #define NAGIOS_WARNING 1
00095 
00096 /* The plugin detected that either the service was not running or it
00097    was above some "critical" threshold.  */
00098 #define NAGIOS_CRITICAL 2
00099 
00100 /* Invalid command line arguments were supplied to the plugin or
00101    low-level failures internal to the plugin (such as unable to fork,
00102    or open a tcp socket) that prevent it from performing the specified
00103    operation. Higher-level errors (such as name resolution errors,
00104    socket timeouts, etc) are outside of the control of plugins and
00105    should generally NOT be reported as UNKNOWN states.  */
00106 #define NAGIOS_UNKNOWN 3
00107 
00108 #define NAGIOS_DEPENDENT 4
00109 
00110 
00111 /* Type definitions.  */
00112 
00116 typedef struct
00117 {
00118   gnutls_session_t session;     
00119   int socket;                   
00120   gchar *username;              
00121   gchar *password;              
00122   gchar *host_string;           
00123   gint port;                    
00124   gint timeout;                 
00125 } server_connection_t;
00126 
00130 typedef struct
00131 {
00132   gboolean report_link;         
00133   gboolean dfn_ids;             
00134   gboolean oids;                
00135   gboolean descr;               
00136   gpointer manager_host;        
00137   gboolean log_messages;        
00138   gboolean scan_end;            
00139   guint autofp;                 
00140 } cmd_status_opts_t;

00151 /* Global options.  */
00152 
00153 /* If this flag is set, UNKNOWN status codes are mapped to CRITICAL.  */
00154 static int warnings_are_errors;
00155 
00156 /* The value of the --overrides option.  */
00157 static gint overrides_flag;
00158 
00159 /* This flag is set if in any output a pipe symbol has been replaced
00160    by a broken bar (U+00A6).  Nagios uses the pipe symbol to separate
00161    performance data from the status. */
00162 static int pipe_symbol_substituted;
00163 
00164 
00165 /* Helper functions and macros.  */
00166 
00167 static void
00168 print_respond_string (const char *string)
00169 {
00170   const char *s;
00171 
00172   for (s = string; *s; s++)
00173     {
00174       if (*s == '|')
00175         {
00176           fputs ("¦", stdout);
00177           pipe_symbol_substituted = 1;
00178         }
00179       else
00180         putchar (*s);
00181     }
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 /* Print the first respond line.  The return value is CODE, which is
00186    the Nagios plugin status code.  */
00187 static int
00188 respond (int code, const char *format, ...)
00189 {
00190   va_list arg_ptr;
00191   char *buf;
00192   const char *status;
00193 
00194   switch (code)
00195     {
00196     case NAGIOS_OK:
00197       status = "OK";
00198       break;
00199     case NAGIOS_WARNING:
00200       status = "WARNING";
00201       break;
00202     case NAGIOS_CRITICAL:
00203       status = "CRITICAL";
00204       break;
00205     case NAGIOS_UNKNOWN:
00206       status = warnings_are_errors ? "CRITICAL" : "UNKNOWN";
00207       break;
00208     case NAGIOS_DEPENDENT:
00209       status = "DEPENDENT";
00210       break;
00211     default:
00212       fputs ("OMP UNKNOWN: Internal plugin error\n", stdout);
00213       return code;
00214     }
00215 
00216   va_start (arg_ptr, format);
00217   buf = g_strdup_vprintf (format, arg_ptr);
00218   va_end (arg_ptr);
00219   printf ("OMP %s: ", status);
00220   print_respond_string (buf);
00221   if (!*buf || buf[strlen (buf) - 1] != '\n')
00222     putchar ('\n');
00223   g_free (buf);
00224   return code;
00225 }
00226 
00227 
00228 /* Print more response lines.  This function does not allow to print
00229    performance data.  */
00230 static void
00231 respond_data (const char *format, ...)
00232 {
00233   va_list arg_ptr;
00234   char *buf;
00235 
00236   va_start (arg_ptr, format);
00237   buf = g_strdup_vprintf (format, arg_ptr);
00238   va_end (arg_ptr);
00239   print_respond_string (buf);
00240   if (!*buf || buf[strlen (buf) - 1] != '\n')
00241     putchar ('\n');
00242   g_free (buf);
00243 }
00244 
00245 /* Print performance data.  */
00246 static void
00247 respond_perf_data (const char *format, ...)
00248 {
00249   va_list arg_ptr;
00250   char *buf;
00251 
00252   if (pipe_symbol_substituted)
00253     fputs ("Note: pipe symbol(s) (U+007C) substituted"
00254            " by broken bar (U+00A6).\n", stdout);
00255 
00256   va_start (arg_ptr, format);
00257   buf = g_strdup_vprintf (format, arg_ptr);
00258   va_end (arg_ptr);
00259   g_print ("%s", buf);
00260   if (!*buf || buf[strlen (buf) - 1] != '\n')
00261     putchar ('\n');
00262   g_free (buf);
00263 }
00264 
00265 static void
00266 do_exit (int rc)
00267 {
00268   if (warnings_are_errors && rc == NAGIOS_UNKNOWN)
00269     rc = NAGIOS_CRITICAL;
00270   exit (rc);
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00274 
00275 
00276 
00277 /* Connection handling. */
00278 
00288 static gboolean
00289 manager_open (server_connection_t * connection)
00290 {
00291   connection->socket =
00292     openvas_server_open (&connection->session, connection->host_string,
00293                          connection->port);
00294 
00295   if (connection->socket == -1)
00296     {
00297       do_exit (respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Failed to acquire socket.\n"));
00298     }
00299 
00300   if (connection->username && connection->password)
00301     {
00302       if (omp_authenticate
00303           (&connection->session, connection->username, connection->password))
00304         {
00305           openvas_server_close (connection->socket, connection->session);
00306           do_exit (respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Failed to authenticate.\n"));
00307         }
00308     }
00309 
00310   return TRUE;
00311 }
00312 
00318 static int
00319 manager_close (server_connection_t * server)
00320 {
00321   return openvas_server_close (server->socket, server->session);
00322 }
00323 
00324 
00325 #define STATUS_BY_TREND 1
00326 #define STATUS_BY_LAST_REPORT 2
00327 
00328 static int
00329 filter_report (entity_t report, const char *host_filter,
00330                cmd_status_opts_t status_opts)
00331 {
00332   entity_t results;
00333   entities_t elems;
00334   entity_t elem;
00335   int any_found = 0;
00336   int high_count = 0;
00337   int medium_count = 0;
00338   int low_count = 0;
00339   int log_count = 0;
00340   int response_code = NAGIOS_OK;
00341   GPtrArray *high_oids = NULL;
00342   GPtrArray *medium_oids = NULL;
00343   GPtrArray *low_oids = NULL;
00344   GPtrArray *log_oids = NULL;
00345   GPtrArray *high_names = NULL;
00346   GPtrArray *medium_names = NULL;
00347   GPtrArray *low_names = NULL;
00348   GPtrArray *log_names = NULL;
00349   GPtrArray *high_descriptions = NULL;
00350   GPtrArray *medium_descriptions = NULL;
00351   GPtrArray *low_descriptions = NULL;
00352   GPtrArray *log_descriptions = NULL;
00353   GPtrArray *high_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00354   GPtrArray *medium_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00355   GPtrArray *low_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00356   GPtrArray *log_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00357   GPtrArray *high_dfn_ids = NULL;
00358   GPtrArray *medium_dfn_ids = NULL;
00359   GPtrArray *low_dfn_ids = NULL;
00360   GPtrArray *log_dfn_ids = NULL;
00361 
00362   results = entity_child (report, "results");
00363   if (results == NULL)
00364     {
00365       return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Failed to get results list.\n");
00366     }
00367 
00368   if (status_opts.oids)
00369     {
00370       high_oids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00371       medium_oids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00372       low_oids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00373       log_oids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00374       high_names = g_ptr_array_new ();
00375       medium_names = g_ptr_array_new ();
00376       low_names = g_ptr_array_new ();
00377       log_names = g_ptr_array_new ();
00378       high_descriptions = g_ptr_array_new ();
00379       medium_descriptions = g_ptr_array_new ();
00380       low_descriptions = g_ptr_array_new ();
00381       log_descriptions = g_ptr_array_new ();
00382       high_dfn_ids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00383       medium_dfn_ids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00384       low_dfn_ids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00385       log_dfn_ids = g_ptr_array_new ();
00386     }
00387   else
00388     {
00389       /* Init to quiet compiler. */
00390       high_oids = medium_oids = low_oids = log_oids = NULL;
00391       high_names = medium_names = low_names = log_names = NULL;
00392       high_descriptions = medium_descriptions = NULL;
00393       low_descriptions = log_descriptions = NULL;
00394     }
00395 
00396   elems = results->entities;
00397   while ((elem = first_entity (elems)))
00398     {
00399       if (strcmp (entity_name (elem), "result") == 0)
00400         {
00401           entity_t entity;
00402           const char *host, *threat;
00403 
00404           entity = entity_child (elem, "host");
00405           if (entity == NULL)
00406             {
00407               return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00408                               "Failed to parse result host.\n");
00409             }
00410           host = entity_text (entity);
00411 
00412           /* Seeking to the right task...  */
00413           if (host_filter != NULL)
00414             if (strcmp (host, host_filter))
00415               goto skip_one_filter_report;
00416           any_found = 1;
00417 
00418           entity = entity_child (elem, "threat");
00419           if (entity == NULL)
00420             {
00421               return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00422                               "Failed to parse result threat.\n");
00423             }
00424           threat = entity_text (entity);
00425           if (!strcmp (threat, "High"))
00426             {
00427               high_count += 1;
00428               if (status_opts.oids)
00429                 {
00430                   g_ptr_array_add (high_oids,
00431                                    (gpointer)
00432                                    entity_attribute (entity_child (elem, "nvt"),
00433                                                      "oid"));
00434                   g_ptr_array_add (high_names,
00435                                    (gpointer)
00436                                    entity_text (entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "name")));
00437                   g_ptr_array_add (high_descriptions,
00438                                    (gpointer)
00439                                    entity_text (entity_child (elem, "description")));
00440                   if (status_opts.dfn_ids) {
00441                     high_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00442                     entity_t cert_entity = entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "cert");
00443                     entities_t cert_refs = cert_entity->entities;
00444                     if (cert_refs != NULL)
00445                       {
00446                         entity_t cert_ref;
00447                         while ((cert_ref = first_entity(cert_refs))) {
00448                           if (strcmp (entity_attribute (cert_ref, "type"), "DFN-CERT") == 0)
00449                             {
00450                               if (high_dfn_ids_array == NULL)
00451                                 high_dfn_ids_array = g_ptr_array_new ();
00452                               g_ptr_array_add (high_dfn_ids_array,
00453                                                (gpointer)
00454                                                entity_attribute (cert_ref, "id"));
00455                             }
00456                           cert_refs = next_entities (cert_refs);
00457                         }
00458                         g_ptr_array_add (high_dfn_ids,
00459                                          (gpointer)
00460                                          high_dfn_ids_array);
00461                       }
00462                     else
00463                       {
00464                         g_ptr_array_add (high_dfn_ids, NULL);
00465                       }
00466                   }
00467                 }
00468             }
00469           else if (!strcmp (threat, "Medium"))
00470             {
00471               medium_count += 1;
00472               if (status_opts.oids)
00473                 {
00474                   g_ptr_array_add (medium_oids,
00475                                    (gpointer)
00476                                    entity_attribute (entity_child (elem, "nvt"),
00477                                                      "oid"));
00478                   g_ptr_array_add (medium_names,
00479                                    (gpointer)
00480                                    entity_text (entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "name")));
00481                   g_ptr_array_add (medium_descriptions,
00482                                    (gpointer)
00483                                    entity_text (entity_child (elem, "description")));
00484                   if (status_opts.dfn_ids) {
00485                     medium_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00486                     entity_t cert_entity = entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "cert");
00487                     entities_t cert_refs = cert_entity->entities;
00488                     if (cert_refs != NULL)
00489                       {
00490                         entity_t cert_ref;
00491                         while ((cert_ref = first_entity(cert_refs))) {
00492                           if (strcmp (entity_attribute (cert_ref, "type"), "DFN-CERT") == 0)
00493                             {
00494                               if (medium_dfn_ids_array == NULL)
00495                                 medium_dfn_ids_array = g_ptr_array_new ();
00496                               g_ptr_array_add (medium_dfn_ids_array,
00497                                                (gpointer)
00498                                                entity_attribute (cert_ref, "id"));
00499                             }
00500                           cert_refs = next_entities (cert_refs);
00501                         }
00502                         g_ptr_array_add (medium_dfn_ids,
00503                                          (gpointer)
00504                                          medium_dfn_ids_array);
00505                       }
00506                     else
00507                       {
00508                         g_ptr_array_add (medium_dfn_ids, NULL);
00509                       }
00510                   }
00511                 }
00512             }
00513           else if (!strcmp (threat, "Low"))
00514             {
00515               low_count += 1;
00516               if (status_opts.oids)
00517                 {
00518                   g_ptr_array_add (low_oids,
00519                                    (gpointer)
00520                                    entity_attribute (entity_child (elem, "nvt"),
00521                                                      "oid"));
00522                   g_ptr_array_add (low_names,
00523                                    (gpointer)
00524                                    entity_text (entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "name")));
00525                   g_ptr_array_add (low_descriptions,
00526                                    (gpointer)
00527                                    entity_text (entity_child (elem, "description")));
00528                   if (status_opts.dfn_ids) {
00529                     low_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00530                     entity_t cert_entity = entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "cert");
00531                     entities_t cert_refs = cert_entity->entities;
00532                     if (cert_refs != NULL)
00533                       {
00534                         entity_t cert_ref;
00535                         while ((cert_ref = first_entity(cert_refs))) {
00536                           if (strcmp (entity_attribute (cert_ref, "type"), "DFN-CERT") == 0)
00537                             {
00538                               if (low_dfn_ids_array == NULL)
00539                                 low_dfn_ids_array = g_ptr_array_new ();
00540                               g_ptr_array_add (low_dfn_ids_array,
00541                                                (gpointer)
00542                                                entity_attribute (cert_ref, "id"));
00543                             }
00544                           cert_refs = next_entities (cert_refs);
00545                         }
00546                         g_ptr_array_add (low_dfn_ids,
00547                                          (gpointer)
00548                                          low_dfn_ids_array);
00549                       }
00550                     else
00551                       {
00552                         g_ptr_array_add (low_dfn_ids, NULL);
00553                       }
00554                   }
00555                 }
00556             }
00557           else if (!strcmp (threat, "Log"))
00558             {
00559               log_count += 1;
00560               if (status_opts.oids)
00561                 {
00562                   g_ptr_array_add (log_oids,
00563                                    (gpointer)
00564                                    entity_attribute (entity_child (elem, "nvt"),
00565                                                      "oid"));
00566                   g_ptr_array_add (log_names,
00567                                    (gpointer)
00568                                    entity_text (entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "name")));
00569                   g_ptr_array_add (log_descriptions,
00570                                    (gpointer)
00571                                    entity_text (entity_child (elem, "description")));
00572                   if (status_opts.dfn_ids) {
00573                     log_dfn_ids_array = NULL;
00574                     entity_t cert_entity = entity_child (entity_child (elem, "nvt"), "cert");
00575                     entities_t cert_refs = cert_entity->entities;
00576                     if (cert_refs != NULL)
00577                       {
00578                         entity_t cert_ref;
00579                         while ((cert_ref = first_entity(cert_refs))) {
00580                           if (strcmp (entity_attribute (cert_ref, "type"), "DFN-CERT") == 0)
00581                             {
00582                               if (log_dfn_ids_array == NULL)
00583                                 log_dfn_ids_array = g_ptr_array_new ();
00584                               g_ptr_array_add (log_dfn_ids_array,
00585                                                (gpointer)
00586                                                entity_attribute (cert_ref, "id"));
00587                             }
00588                           cert_refs = next_entities (cert_refs);
00589                         }
00590                         g_ptr_array_add (log_dfn_ids,
00591                                          (gpointer)
00592                                          log_dfn_ids_array);
00593                       }
00594                     else
00595                       {
00596                         g_ptr_array_add (log_dfn_ids, NULL);
00597                       }
00598                   }
00599                 }
00600             }
00601           else
00602             {
00603               return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Unknown result threat: %s.\n",
00604                               threat);
00605             }
00606         }
00607     skip_one_filter_report:
00608       elems = next_entities (elems);
00609     }
00610 
00611   if (high_count > 0)
00612     {
00613       response_code = NAGIOS_CRITICAL;
00614     }
00615   else if (medium_count > 0)
00616     {
00617       response_code = NAGIOS_WARNING;
00618     }
00619 
00620   respond (response_code, "%i vulnerabilities found - High: %i Medium: %i Low: %i\n",
00621            (high_count + medium_count + low_count), high_count, medium_count, low_count);
00622 
00623   if (results->entities == NULL)
00624     respond_data ("Report did not contain any vulnerabilities");
00625   else if (!any_found && host_filter)
00626     respond_data ("Report did not contain vulnerabilities for IP %s\n", host_filter);
00627 
00628   if (status_opts.report_link)
00629     respond_data ("https://%s/omp?cmd=get_report&report_id=%s\n",
00630                   (gchar *) status_opts.manager_host, entity_attribute (report,
00631                                                                         "id"));
00632 
00633   if (status_opts.oids)
00634     {
00635       int i;
00636       unsigned int j;
00637       for (i = 0; i < high_count; i++)
00638         {
00639           respond_data ("NVT: %s (High) (%s)\n",
00640                         (char *) g_ptr_array_index (high_oids, i),
00641                         (char *) g_ptr_array_index (high_names, i));
00642           if (status_opts.descr)
00643             respond_data ("DESCR: %s\n",
00644                           (char *) g_ptr_array_index (high_descriptions, i));
00645           if (status_opts.dfn_ids && (g_ptr_array_index (high_dfn_ids, i) != NULL))
00646             {
00647               GPtrArray *dfn_ids_array = (GPtrArray *) g_ptr_array_index (high_dfn_ids, i);
00648               GString *dfn_ids_string = NULL;
00649               for (j = 0; j < dfn_ids_array->len; j++)
00650                 {
00651                   if (dfn_ids_string == NULL)
00652                     {
00653                       dfn_ids_string = g_string_new ((char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00654                     }
00655                   else
00656                     {
00657                       g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, (char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00658                     }
00659                   if (j < dfn_ids_array->len - 1)
00660                     {
00661                       g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, ", ");
00662                     }
00663                 }
00664               respond_data ("DFN-CERT: %s\n", dfn_ids_string->str);
00665               g_string_free (dfn_ids_string, FALSE);
00666             }
00667         }
00668 
00669       for (i = 0; i < medium_count; i++)
00670         {
00671           respond_data ("NVT: %s (Medium) (%s)\n",
00672                         (char *) g_ptr_array_index (medium_oids, i),
00673                         (char *) g_ptr_array_index (medium_names, i));
00674           if (status_opts.descr)
00675             respond_data ("DESCR: %s\n",
00676                           (char *) g_ptr_array_index (medium_descriptions, i));
00677           if (status_opts.dfn_ids && (g_ptr_array_index (medium_dfn_ids, i) != NULL))
00678             {
00679               GPtrArray *dfn_ids_array = (GPtrArray *) g_ptr_array_index (medium_dfn_ids, i);
00680               GString *dfn_ids_string = NULL;
00681               for (j = 0; j < dfn_ids_array->len; j++)
00682                 {
00683                   if (dfn_ids_string == NULL)
00684                     {
00685                       dfn_ids_string = g_string_new ((char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00686                     }
00687                   else
00688                     {
00689                       g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, (char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00690                     }
00691                   if (j < dfn_ids_array->len - 1)
00692                     {
00693                       g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, ", ");
00694                     }
00695                 }
00696               respond_data ("DFN-CERT: %s\n", dfn_ids_string->str);
00697               g_string_free (dfn_ids_string, FALSE);
00698             }
00699         }
00700 
00701       for (i = 0; i < low_count; i++)
00702         {
00703           respond_data ("NVT: %s (Low) (%s)\n",
00704                         (char *) g_ptr_array_index (low_oids, i),
00705                         (char *) g_ptr_array_index (low_names, i));
00706           if (status_opts.descr)
00707             respond_data ("DESCR: %s\n",
00708                           (char *) g_ptr_array_index (low_descriptions, i));
00709           if (status_opts.dfn_ids && (g_ptr_array_index (low_dfn_ids, i) != NULL))
00710             {
00711               GPtrArray *dfn_ids_array = (GPtrArray *) g_ptr_array_index (low_dfn_ids, i);
00712               GString *dfn_ids_string = NULL;
00713               for (j = 0; j < dfn_ids_array->len; j++)
00714                 {
00715                   if (dfn_ids_string == NULL)
00716                     {
00717                       dfn_ids_string = g_string_new ((char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00718                     }
00719                   else
00720                     {
00721                       g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, (char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00722                     }
00723                   if (j < dfn_ids_array->len - 1)
00724                     {
00725                       g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, ", ");
00726                     }
00727                 }
00728               respond_data ("DFN-CERT: %s\n", dfn_ids_string->str);
00729               g_string_free (dfn_ids_string, FALSE);
00730             }
00731         }
00732 
00733       if (status_opts.log_messages)
00734         for (i = 0; i < log_count; i++)
00735           {
00736             respond_data ("NVT: %s (Log) (%s)\n",
00737                           (char *) g_ptr_array_index (log_oids, i),
00738                           (char *) g_ptr_array_index (log_names, i));
00739             if (status_opts.descr)
00740               respond_data ("DESCR: %s\n",
00741                             (char *) g_ptr_array_index (log_descriptions, i));
00742             if (status_opts.dfn_ids && (g_ptr_array_index (log_dfn_ids, i) != NULL))
00743               {
00744                 GPtrArray *dfn_ids_array = (GPtrArray *) g_ptr_array_index (log_dfn_ids, i);
00745                 GString *dfn_ids_string = NULL;
00746                 for (j = 0; j < dfn_ids_array->len; j++)
00747                   {
00748                     if (dfn_ids_string == NULL)
00749                       {
00750                         dfn_ids_string = g_string_new ((char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00751                       }
00752                     else
00753                       {
00754                         g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, (char *) g_ptr_array_index (dfn_ids_array, j));
00755                       }
00756                     if (j < dfn_ids_array->len - 1)
00757                       {
00758                         g_string_append (dfn_ids_string, ", ");
00759                       }
00760                   }
00761                 respond_data ("DFN-CERT: %s\n", dfn_ids_string->str);
00762                 g_string_free (dfn_ids_string, FALSE);
00763               }
00764           }
00765 
00766       g_ptr_array_free (high_oids, TRUE);
00767       g_ptr_array_free (medium_oids, TRUE);
00768       g_ptr_array_free (low_oids, TRUE);
00769       g_ptr_array_free (log_oids, TRUE);
00770       g_ptr_array_free (high_names, TRUE);
00771       g_ptr_array_free (medium_names, TRUE);
00772       g_ptr_array_free (low_names, TRUE);
00773       g_ptr_array_free (log_names, TRUE);
00774       g_ptr_array_free (high_descriptions, TRUE);
00775       g_ptr_array_free (medium_descriptions, TRUE);
00776       g_ptr_array_free (low_descriptions, TRUE);
00777       g_ptr_array_free (log_descriptions, TRUE);
00778       g_ptr_array_free (high_dfn_ids, TRUE);
00779       g_ptr_array_free (medium_dfn_ids, TRUE);
00780       g_ptr_array_free (low_dfn_ids, TRUE);
00781       g_ptr_array_free (log_dfn_ids, TRUE);
00782     }
00783 
00784   if (status_opts.scan_end)
00785     respond_data ("SCAN_END: %s\n", entity_text (entity_child (report, "scan_end")));
00786 
00787   respond_perf_data ("|High=%i Medium=%i Low=%i\n",
00788                      high_count, medium_count, low_count);
00789   return response_code;
00790 }
00791 
00792 /* If host_filter is not NULL, mode must be STATUS_BY_LAST_REPORT and
00793    host_filter is a string specifying for which IP the last results
00794    are returned.  */
00795 static int
00796 cmd_status_impl (server_connection_t * connection, const char *task_filter,
00797                  entities_t tasks, int mode, char *host_filter,
00798                  cmd_status_opts_t status_opts)
00799 {
00800   entity_t task;
00801   while ((task = first_entity (tasks)))
00802     {
00803       if (strcmp (entity_name (task), "task") == 0)
00804         {
00805           entity_t entity, report;
00806           const char *name, *trend;
00807 
00808           entity = entity_child (task, "name");
00809           if (entity == NULL)
00810             {
00811               return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Failed to parse task name.\n");
00812             }
00813           name = entity_text (entity);
00814 
00815           /* Seeking to the right task...  */
00816           if (strcmp (task_filter, name))
00817             goto skip_one_status_impl;
00818 
00819           /* FIXME: Check status (Done vs Requested)  */
00820 
00821           if (mode == STATUS_BY_TREND)
00822             {
00823               entity = entity_child (task, "trend");
00824               if (entity == NULL)
00825                 return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00826                                 "Failed to parse task trend.\n");
00827 
00828               trend = entity_text (entity);
00829 
00830               if (!strcmp (trend, "up") || !strcmp (trend, "more"))
00831                 {
00832                   return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Trend is %s\n", trend);
00833                 }
00834               else if (!strcmp (trend, "down") || !strcmp (trend, "same")
00835                        || !strcmp (trend, "less"))
00836                 {
00837                   return respond (NAGIOS_OK, "Trend is %s\n", trend);
00838                 }
00839               else if (!strcmp (trend, ""))
00840                 {
00841                   return respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN, "Trend is not available\n");
00842                 }
00843               else
00844                 {
00845                   respond (NAGIOS_OK, "Trend is unknown: %s\n", trend);
00846                   return NAGIOS_CRITICAL;       /* Fixme: Is that correct?  */
00847                 }
00848             }
00849           else
00850             {
00851               /* STATUS_BY_LAST_REPORT */
00852               entity_t full_report;
00853               omp_get_report_opts_t opts = omp_get_report_opts_defaults;
00854 
00855               report = entity_child (task, "last_report");
00856               if (report == NULL)
00857                 return respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN, "Report is not available\n");
00858 
00859               report = entity_child (report, "report");
00860               if (report == NULL)
00861                 return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00862                                 "Failed to parse last_report\n");
00863 
00864               opts.report_id = entity_attribute (report, "id");
00865               if (opts.report_id == NULL)
00866                 {
00867                   return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00868                                   "Failed to parse last_report's "
00869                                   "report ID.\n");
00870                 }
00871 
00872               opts.apply_overrides = overrides_flag;
00873               opts.autofp = status_opts.autofp;
00874 
00875               if (omp_get_report_ext (&(connection->session), opts, &full_report) != 0)
00876                 return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00877                                 "Failed to get full report.\n");
00878 
00879               full_report = entity_child (full_report, "report");
00880               if (full_report == NULL)
00881                 return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00882                                 "Failed to get first full report wrapper\n");
00883 
00884               full_report = entity_child (full_report, "report");
00885               if (full_report == NULL)
00886                 return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL,
00887                                 "Failed to get first full report\n");
00888 
00889               return filter_report (full_report, host_filter, status_opts);
00890 
00891               /* FIXME: Maybe add check here if the report is too
00892                  old?  */
00893             }
00894 
00895           /* Never reached.  */
00896           return respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN, "Internal error\n");
00897         }
00898     skip_one_status_impl:
00899       tasks = next_entities (tasks);
00900     }
00901 
00902   return respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Unknown task: %s\n", task_filter);
00903 }
00904 
00905 
00906 /* Entry point. */
00907 
00908 int
00909 main (int argc, char **argv)
00910 {
00911   server_connection_t *connection = NULL;
00912   /* The return status of the command. */
00913   int exit_status = -1;
00914 
00915   /* Global options. */
00916   static gboolean print_version = FALSE;
00917   static gboolean be_verbose = FALSE;
00918   static gchar *manager_host_string = NULL;
00919   static gchar *manager_port_string = NULL;
00920   static gchar *manager_timeout_string = NULL;
00921   static gchar *omp_username = NULL;
00922   static gchar *omp_password = NULL;
00923   /* Command get-omp-version. */
00924   static gboolean cmd_ping = FALSE;
00925   static gboolean cmd_status = FALSE;
00926   static gboolean status_trend = FALSE;
00927   static gboolean status_last_report = FALSE;
00928   static gchar *task_string = NULL;
00929   static gchar *host_filter = NULL;
00930   static gboolean connection_details = FALSE;
00931   static gboolean report_link = FALSE;
00932   static gboolean display_dfn_ids = FALSE;
00933   static gboolean display_oids = FALSE;
00934   static gboolean display_descriptions = FALSE;
00935   static gboolean display_log_messages = FALSE;
00936   static gboolean display_scan_end = FALSE;
00937   static guint autofp = 0;
00938   /* The rest of the args. */
00939   static gchar **rest = NULL;
00940 
00941   GError *error = NULL;
00942 
00943   GOptionContext *option_context;
00944   static GOptionEntry option_entries[] = {
00945     /* Global options. */
00946     {"host", 'H', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING, &manager_host_string,
00947      "Connect to manager on host <host>", "<host>"},
00948     {"port", 'p', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING, &manager_port_string,
00949      "Use port number <number>", "<number>"},
00950     // FIXME!!!
00951     {"timeout", 't', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING, &manager_timeout_string,
00952      "Use timeout <number>", "<number>"},
00953     {"version", 'V', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &print_version,
00954      "Print version.", NULL},
00955     {"verbose", 'v', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &be_verbose,
00956      "Verbose messages (WARNING: may reveal passwords).", NULL},
00957     {"Werror", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &warnings_are_errors,
00958      "Turn status UNKNOWN into status CRITICIAL.", NULL},
00959     {"username", 'u', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING, &omp_username,
00960      "OMP username", "<username>"},
00961     {"password", 'w', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING, &omp_password,
00962      "OMP password", "<password>"},
00963     {"ping", 'O', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &cmd_ping,
00964      "Ping the manager", NULL},
00965     {"status", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &cmd_status,
00966      "Report status of task", NULL},
00967     {"trend", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &status_trend,
00968      "Report status by trend (default)", NULL},
00969     {"last-report", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &status_last_report,
00970      "Report status by last report", NULL},
00971     {"task", 'T', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING, &task_string,
00972      "Report status of task <task>", "<task>"},
00973     {"host-filter", 'F', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING, &host_filter,
00974      "Report last report status of host <ip>", "<ip>"},
00975     {"overrides", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_INT, &overrides_flag,
00976      "Include overrides (N: 0=no, 1=yes)", "N"},
00977     {"details", 'd', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &connection_details,
00978      "Include connection details in output", NULL},
00979     {"report-link", 'l', 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &report_link,
00980      "Include URL of report in output", NULL},
00981     {"dfn", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &display_dfn_ids,
00982      "Include DFN-CERT IDs on vulnerabilities in output", NULL},
00983     {"oid", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &display_oids,
00984      "Include OIDs of NVTs finding vulnerabilities in output", NULL},
00985     {"descr", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &display_descriptions,
00986      "Include descriptions of NVTs finding vulnerabilities in output", NULL},
00987     {"showlog", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &display_log_messages,
00988      "Include log messages in output", NULL},
00989     {"scanend", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_NONE, &display_scan_end,
00990      "Include timestamp of scan end in output", NULL},
00991     {"autofp", 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_INT, &autofp,
00992      "Trust vendor security updates for automatic false positive filtering (0=No, 1=full match, 2=partial).", "<n>"},
00993     {G_OPTION_REMAINING, 0, 0, G_OPTION_ARG_STRING_ARRAY, &rest,
00994      NULL, NULL},
00995     {NULL}
00996   };
00997 
00998   if (setlocale (LC_ALL, "") == NULL)
00999     {
01000       respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Failed to setlocale\n\n");
01001       do_exit (NAGIOS_CRITICAL);
01002     }
01003 
01004   option_context =
01005     g_option_context_new ("- OpenVAS OMP Command Line Interface");
01006   g_option_context_add_main_entries (option_context, option_entries, NULL);
01007   if (!g_option_context_parse (option_context, &argc, &argv, &error))
01008     {
01009       printf ("%s\n\n", error->message);
01010       do_exit (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN);
01011     }
01012   g_option_context_free (option_context);
01013 
01014   if (print_version)
01015     {
01016       printf ("Check-OMP Nagios Command Plugin %s\n", OPENVASCLI_VERSION);
01017       printf ("Copyright (C) 2013 Greenbone Networks GmbH\n");
01018       printf ("License GPLv2+: GNU GPL version 2 or later\n");
01019       printf
01020         ("This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it.\n"
01021          "There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.\n\n");
01022       do_exit (EXIT_SUCCESS);
01023     }
01024 
01025   /* Check that one and at most one command option is present. */
01026   {
01027     int commands;
01028     commands = (int) cmd_ping + (int) cmd_status;
01029     if (commands == 0)
01030       {
01031         respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN, "One command option must be present.\n");
01032         do_exit (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN);
01033       }
01034     if (commands > 1)
01035       {
01036         respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN, "Only one command option must be present.\n");
01037         do_exit (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN);
01038       }
01039   }
01040 
01041   /* Set defaults.  */
01042   if (!status_trend && !status_last_report)
01043     status_trend = TRUE;
01044   if (status_trend && status_last_report)
01045     {
01046       respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN, "--trend and --last-report are exclusive.\n");
01047       do_exit (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN);
01048     }
01049 
01050 
01051   /* Setup the connection structure.  */
01052   connection = g_malloc0 (sizeof (*connection));
01053 
01054   if (manager_host_string != NULL)
01055     connection->host_string = manager_host_string;
01056   else
01057     connection->host_string = OPENVASMD_ADDRESS;
01058 
01059   if (manager_port_string != NULL)
01060     connection->port = atoi (manager_port_string);
01061   else
01062     connection->port = OPENVASMD_PORT;
01063 
01064   if (connection->port <= 0 || connection->port >= 65536)
01065     {
01066       respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN,
01067                "Manager port must be a number between 0 and 65536.\n");
01068       do_exit (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN);
01069     }
01070 
01071   if (omp_username != NULL)
01072     connection->username = omp_username;
01073   if (omp_password != NULL)
01074     connection->password = omp_password;
01075 
01076   if (manager_timeout_string != NULL)
01077     connection->timeout = atoi (manager_timeout_string);
01078   else
01079     connection->timeout = DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT;
01080 
01081   if (connection->timeout < 0)
01082     {
01083       respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN,
01084                "Request timeout must be a non-negative number.\n");
01085       do_exit (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN);
01086     }
01087 
01088   if (be_verbose)
01089     {
01091       fprintf (stderr, "Will try to connect to host %s, port %d...\n",
01092                connection->host_string, connection->port);
01093     }
01094   else
01095     {
01096 #ifndef _WIN32
01097       g_log_set_default_handler (openvas_log_silent, NULL);
01098 #endif
01099     }
01100 
01101   /* Run the single command. */
01102 
01103   if (cmd_ping)
01104     {
01105       int res;
01106       manager_open (connection);
01107       /* Returns 0 on success, 1 if manager closed connection, 2 on
01108          timeout, -1 on error */
01109       res = omp_ping (&(connection->session), connection->timeout);
01110       if (res == 0)
01111         {
01112           exit_status = respond (NAGIOS_OK, "Alive and kicking!\n");
01113         }
01114       else if (res == 1)
01115         {
01116           exit_status = respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Connection closed\n");
01117         }
01118       else if (res == 2)
01119         {
01120           exit_status = respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Connection timed out\n");
01121         }
01122       else
01123         {
01124           exit_status = respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Unknown error\n");
01125         }
01126       manager_close (connection);
01127     }
01128   else if (cmd_status)
01129     {
01130       entity_t status;
01131 
01132       if (task_string == NULL)
01133         {
01134           exit_status =
01135             respond (NAGIOS_UNKNOWN, "Status request requires task name\n");
01136         }
01137       else
01138         {
01139           manager_open (connection);
01140           omp_get_tasks_opts_t opts;
01141           cmd_status_opts_t status_opts;
01142 
01143           opts = omp_get_tasks_opts_defaults;
01144           opts.details = 1;
01145           opts.filter = "permission=any owner=any rows=-1";
01146 
01147           if (display_descriptions)
01148             display_oids = TRUE;
01149 
01150           if (display_dfn_ids)
01151             display_oids = TRUE;
01152 
01153           status_opts.report_link = report_link;
01154           status_opts.dfn_ids = display_dfn_ids;
01155           status_opts.oids = display_oids;
01156           status_opts.manager_host = (gpointer) connection->host_string;
01157           status_opts.descr = display_descriptions;
01158           status_opts.log_messages = display_log_messages;
01159           status_opts.scan_end = display_scan_end;
01160           status_opts.autofp = autofp;
01161 
01162           /* Returns 0 on success, -1 or OMP code on error.  */
01163           if (omp_get_tasks_ext (&(connection->session), opts, &status))
01164             {
01165               exit_status = respond (NAGIOS_CRITICAL, "Get tasks failed\n");
01166             }
01167           else
01168             {
01169               exit_status =
01170                 cmd_status_impl (connection, task_string, status->entities,
01171                                  status_trend ? STATUS_BY_TREND :
01172                                  STATUS_BY_LAST_REPORT, host_filter,
01173                                  status_opts);
01174             }
01175           manager_close (connection);
01176         }
01177     }
01178   else
01179     /* The option processing ensures that at least one command is present. */
01180     assert (0);
01181 
01182   /* Exit. */
01183 
01184   if (connection_details)
01185     {
01186       if (connection->host_string)
01187         respond_data ("GSM_Host: %s:%d\n", connection->host_string,
01188                       (int) connection->port);
01189       if (connection->username)
01190         respond_data ("OMP_User: %s\n", connection->username);
01191       if (task_string && cmd_status)
01192         respond_data ("Task: %s\n", task_string);
01193     }
01194 
01195   if (be_verbose)
01196     {
01197       if (exit_status != NAGIOS_OK)
01198         respond_data ("Command failed.\n");
01199       else
01200         respond_data ("Command completed successfully.\n");
01201     }
01202 
01203   do_exit (exit_status);
01204 }
